name: REACH Alliance
goal:
The REACH Alliance is an “association de fait” regrouping and representing a number of sectors in the Inorganics Industry: ferro-alloys, cement, ceramics & expanded clay, glass, gypsum, iron & steel, industrial minerals & lime, metallic ores, paper, precast concrete, ready-mixed concrete, carbon & graphite. This Alliance roughly represents a total turnover of 335 billion Euro, manufactures about 2.3 billion tonnes of products and provides direct employment to over 1.75 million people.
The purpose of the Association is to represent the interest of its members vis-à-vis the European Institutions, their related Agencies (e.g. ECHA) and Committees or groups (e.g. CARACAL) in the context of the REACH Regulation 1907/2006 (EC) and CLP Regulation 1272/2008 (EC), their implementation and review.
The REACH Alliance aims to contribute to the successful implementation of the requirements of the REACH and CLP Regulations. More specifically, our objective is to offer a platform for our members where they can exchange information and expertise, work on issues of common interest and build up, where possible, common positions towards other stakeholders.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Public Health, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
REACH Regulation 1907/2006 (EC) and CLP Regulation 1272/2008 (EC); their implementation, amendment and review;
Fitness check on chemical legislation; Non-toxic environment strategy; Interface between chemicals and waste;
REACH review program; ECHA Guidances: Drafting and revision
